modName: Legendary Shield of Ysgramor - DELETED - DELETED
summary: Makes the Shield of Ysgramor more powerful, and thus more true to the legend! The shield can now hold back more mighty blows, more powerful spells, and makes you more resistant to everything!
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]Description[/b][/u]
Makes the Shield of Ysgramor more powerful, and thus more true to the legend! The shield can now hold back more mighty blows, more powerful spells, and makes you more resistant to everything!

[b]Standard Version[/b]
Base Armor Rating increased from 20 to 30.
Magical Resistance  increased from +20% to +30%.
Health points increased from +20 to +35.

[b]Mighty Version[/b]
Base Armor Rating increased from 20 to 45.
Magical Resistance  increased from +20% to +50%.
Health points increased from +20 to +50.

[b][u]Installation[/b][/u]
Extract to your Skyrim Data folder. (...\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim)
author: Zaldir
